custom-sql.sql: SELECT pml_edm_issuingplace.* FROM pml_edm_issuingplace WHERE (lower(pml_edm_issuingplace.issuingplacecode) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(pml_edm_issuingplace.issuingplacename) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM pml_edm_issuingplace WHERE (lower(pml_edm_issuingplace.issuingplacecode) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(pml_edm_issuingplace.issuingplacename) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
